oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Albia Drive-In Theatre Job No. 36831
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 1384) for an order placed by the Albia Drive-in Theatre for 50 three color window cards for a showing of Country Music on Broadway at the Albia Drive-in Theatre in Albia, Iowa on May 21-23. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
